file_content.text: I told them you always come back alive.
Stop scaring me like that, Agent.
Sorry I missed the fun.
This is why I hate droids.
One of these days, you're gonna give me a heart attack.
I knew you were alive. I felt it.
We heard explosions. The tunnel collapsed. What happened?
ARIES wants us dead. SCORPIO wants him destroyed. Vaylin's chasing her fleet. We need out of here, and going underground didn't work.
There's a landing pad on the rooftop, but we have no Gravestone to land on it.
The Gravestone isn't the only Alliance vessel here. My shuttle's in its hangar.
You'd pilot the shuttle through your implants and land it on the roof. That's brilliant, Theron!
You can fly it here. Perfect!
If it works.
Good idea. Let's try something with actual firepower.
Why not the Gravestone?
If the Gravestone was online, I'd have scanned it by now.
You only think of this now? You've wasted everyone's time.
Think faster next time.
I've been a little distracted.
Sold. I'll start scanning for the shuttle. Fingers crossed!
Even if Theron can bring his ship, we'll never get aboard. Those droids will cut us down the moment we step outside.
If only we had an even bigger droid to keep the ones outside busy...
We'll operate it by remote control. It'll pack a mean punch, but it won't hold up for long.
You're sure you want to fight them alone?
I'll handle the droids. Protect Theron.
Don't worry about me.
Are you kidding? I'm a walking tank. It's payback time.
It's more fun that way.
You'd just get in my way. Go to the roof with Theron.
You wouldn't be any help.
Okay... what if we go up?
That's no help. You can't find either one of them.
But I haven't been scanning for my shuttle. If I can establish a connection to it, I might be able to take command remotely.
There's nothing like poetic justice. Let's make a new friend--and kill our enemies.
I like Vette's idea.
I'm not sure we can control Iokath technology.
That's a big risk.
It was built by aliens, but it's just a machine.
Why settle for distraction when we can get annihilation?
And tear them to pieces.
Either way, we win.
Contact! I found my shuttle. Running a pre-flight check...
We're in business! Signal's weak, though. I need to be on the roof to boost the connection.
We're ready.
It just needs to last until the shuttle gets here.
The logic circuits are fried. Somebody'll have to control this thing... from the inside.
That droid is mostly intact. It's well-armed, and one of them. They'd never suspect until it was too late.
Unless we use that droid.
This is why you're the Commander.
It's nothing we can't handle. They're just droids.
We're stronger. We'll survive.
Correction: hundreds of droids. We need to fight smarter, not harder.
If all you have to offer is negativity, you can be the first out the door.
Your attitude isn't helping.
We have to account for everything if this is going to work.
We send the droid to attack while we hit the roof. It could work.
Go make a mess, you big lug.
Don't forget about the rocket boots. See you up top!
Now we know what to get you for Life Day.
You're gonna record holos for us to watch later, right?
